pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Spectral Inference for Stationary Time Series // Implementations of Bayesian parametric, nonparametric and semiparametric procedures for univariate and multivariate time series. The package is based on the methods presented in C. Kirch et al (2018) doi:10.1214/18-BA1126 and A. Meier (2018) https://opendata.uni-halle.de//handle/1981185920/13470. It was supported by DFG grant KI 1443/3-1.
